cards.title: Athena
powers: You may move one [u]aspect[/u] card from your trash into play. {Athena} deals 1 target 1 radiant damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: One hero may deal 1 target 1 radiant damage.
Select a target. Reduce the next damage dealt to that target by 2.
One hero may use a power now.

openingLines.default: Brace yourself against the might of the goddess of wisdom!
openingLines.TheEnneadInstructions: You guys again? I thought we settled this centuries ago.

cards.title: Adamant Spear
body: increase damage dealt by {Athena} by 1.
cards.flavorText: “Reforged by Hephaestus in 2138.{BR}and it's yours, I believe.”

cards.title: Aegis of Amalthea
body: Reduce Damage dealt to this card by 1.
Whenever a Hero Target in your play area would be dealt Damage, you may redirect it to this card.

cards.title: Divine Phalanx
body: Choose a target. {Athena} and up to 2 other hero targets deal that target 1 radiant damage each. If there is an [u]aspect[/u] card in play, this damage is irreducible.

cards.title: Erichthonius
body: This card is immune to toxic damage.
The first time each turn {Athena} deals damage to a villain target, this card deals 1 target 1 melee damage.
At the end of your turn, if there is an [u]aspect[/u] card in play, this card deals 1 target 1 toxic damage.
cards.flavorText: “I wasss a king, onssse.{BR}Long ago. Lossst to time.”

cards.title: Glaukopis
body: When this card enters play, destroy any other [u]aspect[/u] cards.
You may look at the top card of your deck at any time.
powers: Reveal the top 2 cards of any 2 decks. Put them back on top of their decks in any order. 1 player may draw 1 card.
cards.flavorText: “She sees more than I ever,{BR}or never for that matter, could.”

cards.title: Hoplite Advance
body: {Athena} deals up to 3 targets 2 melee damage each.

cards.title: Horn of Amalthea
body: You may draw an additional card during your draw phase.
powers: Discard 3 cards. If you do so, draw 4 cards. then, if no [u]aspect[/u] cards are in play, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: “I trust you will have the wisdom{BR}to use this only when necessary?”

cards.title: Light of Olympus
body: Each hero target regains 1 HP.
If there is an [u]aspect[/u] card in play, {Athena} deals each non-hero target 1 radiant damage.
cards.flavorText: “Does she have to be so gol-derned{BR}[b]shiny[/b] when she does that?”

cards.title: Nyctimene
body: This card is immune to psychic damage.
The first time each turn {Athena} deals damage to a villain target, this card deals 1 target 1 projectile damage.
At the end of your turn, if there is an [u]aspect[/u] card in play, this card deals 1 target 1 psychic damage.
cards.flavorText: “Forever your faithful servant of{BR}the night, my lady goddess.”

cards.title: Oracle
body: Reveal the top 2 cards of the Villain deck. Put 1 of them on top of the Villain deck and the other on the bottom.
cards.flavorText: “When shines the third moon upon{BR}this realm; only then should{BR}you seek the wytch-helm.”

cards.title: Pallas
body: When this card enters play, destroy any other [u]aspect[/u] cards.
The first time each turn a villain target deals damage to a hero character other than {Athena}, {Athena} deals that target 2 melee damage.
powers: {Athena} deals 1 target 3 melee damage. If that Target dealt a hero target Damage since your last turn, this damage is irreducible.
cards.flavorText: “Excellent, Minnie! embrace the light{BR}and it shall always shield your allies.”

cards.title: Parthenos
body: When this card enters play, destroy any other [u]aspect[/u] cards.
At the end of your turn, {Athena} regains 1 HP.
powers: Search your Deck or Trash for a [u]legend[/u] and put it into Play. If you searched your Deck, shuffle your Deck.
cards.flavorText: “You think me unarmed, uncle?{BR}Clearly your wits left with the tide.”

cards.title: Patron of Heroes
body: You may discard a card. If you do, one player other than you may draw 2 cards.
{Athena} may deal herself 2 irreducible psychic damage. If she does, one hero target other than {Athena} may regain 4 HP.
{Athena} may deal 1 hero character target 2 irreducible radiant damage. If she does, that hero may play a card or use a power now.
cards.flavorText: “What [b]is[/b] this sensation!?{BR}is it... could it be [b]your[/b] doing?”

cards.title: Promachos
body: When this card enters play, destroy any other [u]aspect[/u] cards.
Whenever a hero target is dealt damage, you may redirect it to {Athena}. Reduce damage redirected to {Athena} by 1.
powers: {Athena} deals each non-hero target 1 sonic damage. Destroy 1 environment card.
cards.flavorText: “That colossus was still but a{BR}moment ago. [b]run!![/b]”

cards.title: Skin of Marble
body: Reduce damage dealt to {Athena} by 1.
After {Athena} is dealt damage by a non-Hero target, if there is an [u]aspect[/u] card in play, she deals that target 2 melee Damage.

cards.title: Theonosis
body: When this card enters play, destroy any other [u]aspect[/u] cards.
You may play an additional card during your play phase.
powers: Destroy 1 non-character hero card. If you do so, destroy 1 ongoing card.

promoCards.title: Athena
powers: If there is an [u]aspect[/u] card in play, {Athena} deals 1 target 1 melee and 1 radiant damage. If not, draw 2 cards, then discard 1 card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card.
One player may play a card.
Increase the next damage dealt by a hero target by 1.

openingLines.default: adults are all the same. do [b]not[/b] underestimate me!

promoCards.title: Athena
powers: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. If an [u]aspect[/u] card is revealed you may play it now. Move 1 revealed card to the bottom of your deck, and move the rest to your hand.
incapacitatedAbilities: One hero may use a power now.
Look at the bottom card of each deck and replace or discard each one.
One hero may discard a card to reduce damage dealt to them by 1 until the start of your turn.
